name: clipcascade
description: ClipCascade is a self-hosted image uploader with link sharing and gallery features. It's designed to simplify uploading to cloud storage while maintaining full privacy and control, ideal for personal use.
features: Image Uploader: Simple, private image upload service. Easy sharing.
Link Sharing: Generate shareable links for uploads. Quick distribution.
Gallery Features: Organize uploads in galleries. Beautiful presentation.
Cloud Storage: Upload to your preferred cloud storage. Flexible backend.
Privacy-First: Self-hosted for complete data control. Your images, your server.
Cross-Platform: Apps for desktop, mobile, and web. Upload anywhere.
Personal Use: Designed for individual file sharing. Simple solution.
